history.proof: intros net net' H1 H2 H3. unfold leader_sublog_host_invariant in *. intros leader e h H4 H5 H6. simpl in *. shelve.

ctx: intros net net' H1 H2 H3.
intros leader e h H4 H5 H6.
exceptions.tactic: specialize (H1 leader e h H4 H5 H6).
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface olpti : one_leader_per_term_interface net, net' : network H1 : forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) -> In e (log (nwState net leader)) H2 : forall h : Net.name, log (nwState net h) = log (nwState net' h) H3 : forall h : Net.name, type (nwState net' h) = Leader -> type (nwState net h) = Leader /\\ currentTerm (nwState net h) = currentTerm (nwState net' h) leader : Net.name e : entry h : Net.name H4 : type (nwState net' leader) = Leader H5 : In e (log (nwState net' h)) H6 : eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net' leader) The term "H4" has type "type (nwState net' leader) = Leader" while it is expected to have type "type (nwState net leader) = Leader".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
cei: candidate_entries_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface
olpti: one_leader_per_term_interface

Goal:
forall net net' : network, leader_sublog_host_invariant net -> (forall h : Net.name, log (nwState net h) = log (nwState net' h)) -> (forall h : Net.name, type (nwState net' h) = Leader -> type (nwState net h) = Leader /\ currentTerm (nwState net h) = currentTerm (nwState net' h)) -> leader_sublog_host_invariant net'

Premises:
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Notation currentTerm := (RaftState.currentTerm term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Record candidate_entries_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_candidate_entries_interface { candidate_entries_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> CandidateEntries net } Arguments candidate_entries_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_candidate_entries_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Inductive serverType : Set := Follower : serverType | Candidate : serverType | Leader : serverType
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record cronies_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_cronies_correct_interface { cronies_correct_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> cronies_correct net } Arguments cronies_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_cronies_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> refined_raft_net_invariant
leader_sublog_host_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) -> In e (log (nwState net leader)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_host_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record one_leader_per_term_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_one_leader_per_term_interface { one_leader_per_term_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leader_per_term net } Arguments one_leader_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_one_leader_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record votes_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_votes_correct_interface { votes_correct_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> votes_correct net } Arguments votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Notation type := (RaftState.type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
one_leader_per_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h h' : Net.name, currentTerm (nwState net h) = currentTerm (nwState net h') -> type (nwState net h) = Leader -> type (nwState net h') = Leader -> h = h' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments one_leader_per_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall net net' : network, (forall h : Net.name, nwState net h = nwState net' h) -> (forall p : packet, In p (nwPackets net') -> In p (nwPackets net)) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (gd : ghost_data) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') -> nwPackets net = nwPackets net' ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net net' : network) (gd : ghost_data) (d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : Net.name) (d' : raft_data), reboot d = d' -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') -> nwPackets net = nwPackets net' ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
won_election_cronies : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name), cronies_correct net -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (cronies (fst (nwState net h)) (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h))))) = true
Inductive step_failure (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (params : FailureParams P) : step_relation (list Net.name * network) (Net.name * (input + list output)) := StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(p...

votes_received_cronies = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (crony : name), In crony (votesReceived (snd (nwState net h))) -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader \/ type (snd (nwState net h)) = Candidate -> In crony (cronies (fst (nwState net h)) (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_received_cronies {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
candidateEntries_wonElection : forall (net : network) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), one_vote_per_term net -> cronies_votes net -> votes_received_cronies net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = eTerm e -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived (snd (nwState net h)))) = true -> type (snd (nwState net h)) <> Candidate
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n

votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n : name), In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> votedFor (snd (nwState net h)) = Some n : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

SpecLemmas.handleRequestVoteReply_spec : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' <> Candidate) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true)

one_vote_per_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n n' : name), In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t, n') (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> n = n' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments one_vote_per_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

```coq
intros net net' H1 H2 H3.
unfold leader_sublog_host_invariant in *.
intros leader e h H4 H5 H6.
specialize (H1 leader e h H4 H5 H6).
simpl in *.
auto.
```
